titles.title: A bill to empower communities to establish a continuum of care for individuals experiencing mental or behavioral health crisis, and for other purposes.
A bill to empower communities to establish a continuum of care for individuals experiencing mental or behavioral health crisis, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
